p.span: SWL Schools will continue with "Distance Learning" through the end of the school year due to orders from Governor DeWine.

span.div: Continue to monitor our website and social media for the most up to date information.

div.a: Coffee Talks and Open Office Hours

br.span: Come join us at these monthly events with any questions or comments that you may have.

a.title: Starting at: 6:00 PM Ending at: 7:00 PM

This focus for this month is special education.  However, if you have a topic for discussion outside of this focus, please feel free to attend anyways.  We always welcome open communication.  Location: Depot Street Coffee House Starting at: 9:00 AM Ending at: 10:00 AM
